Method Detail

getLargeIconFor

public static java.lang.String getLargeIconFor(MenuNode node)
Get the large icon "*_48.png" for a given menu node.

Parameters:
node - menu node to return large icon for.
Returns:
the url for the icon, null if there is no icon, or the icond does not follow the small icon naming pattern "*_16.png".

getIconFor

public static java.lang.String getIconFor(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,MenuNode> nodesById,
                                          java.lang.String id)
Get the icon for menu node with the given id.

Parameters:
nodesById - a Map of MenuNodes keyed by Id. May contain the node.
id - the id to look for.
Returns:
the url for the icon, possibly null.

getLargeIconFor

public static java.lang.String getLargeIconFor(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,MenuNode> nodesById,
                                               java.lang.String id)
Get the large icon for menu node with the given id.

Parameters:
nodesById - a Map of MenuNodes keyed by Id. May contain the node.
id - the id to look for.
Returns:
the large url for the icon, possibly null.
See Also:
getLargeIconFor(MenuNode)

getRootMenuNodes

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,MenuNode> getRootMenuNodes()
Get all the Root level menu nodes from the root_menu.xml file. In rel10 anvironments expect this to include classic UIShell and FUSE+ menu nodes.

Returns:
All menu nodes keyed on the id of the node. This id corresponds to the globalItemNodeId parameter of the globalMenuNavigate() API.
